content.text:
# Armley (ward)

| party1      = Green
| councillor2 = Andy Parnham
| party2      = Labour
| councillor3 = Alice Smart
| party3      = Labour
| population     = 17,343
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Armley is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council in the west of Leeds, West Yorkshire, covering the district of the same name.
Councillors since 1980
represented Castleton ward (1968-1973), Armley and Castleton ward (1973-1980) and Armley ward (1980-1983). Member of Parliament for Leeds West (1983-1987).]]
